name: Cloudflare DNS Management
description: Deploy and update Cloudflare configurations from Git repository

spec.question_description: Enter the ticket/change request number for audit tracking (e.g., JIRA-1234, CHG0012345)
Select the platform to deploy (L=Production, S=Staging, T=Test, G=Global). Domain is auto-detected from platform configuration.
Select what to deploy: domain=SSL/cache/WAF/firewall/performance, dns=DNS records only, network=Health checks, notifications=Alerts
Preview changes without applying them. Recommended for first-time deployments and validating changes.
